owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Are there periodicities present in ?ClimateVariable...
Are the periodicities in ?ClimateVariable ... intermittent?
Is ?ClimateVariable1 ... coherent with ?ClimateVariable2 ... ?
Is ?ClimateVariable1 ... correlated with ?ClimateVariable2 ... ?
Does ?ClimateVariable1 ... cause changes in ?ClimateVariable2 ... ?

owl:NamedIndividual.sqo:hasOptionsQuery: ?ClimateVariable <http://linked.earth/ontology#hasVariableID> ?ClVarId . ?ClimateVariable <http://linked.earth/ontology#name> ?ClimateVariableName . FILTER (!REGEX(str(?ClimateVariableName), "year") && !REGEX(str(?ClimateVariableName), "age")) optional { ?ClimateVariable <http://linked.earth/ontology#partOfCompilation> ?Compilation . ?Compilation <http://linked.earth/ontology#name> ?CompilationName . } FILTER (!bound(?CompilationName) || REGEX(str(?CompilationName), "Temp12k") || REGEX(str(?CompilationName), "Pages2kTemperature") || REGEX(str(?CompilationName), "iso2k")|| REGEX(str(?CompilationName) , "wNAm"))

?ClimateVariable2 <http://linked.earth/ontology#hasVariableID> ?ClVarId2 . ?ClimateVariable2 <http://linked.earth/ontology#name> ?ClimateVariableName2 . FILTER (!REGEX(str(?ClimateVariableName2), "year") && !REGEX(str(?ClimateVariableName2), "age")) optional { ?ClimateVariable2 <http://linked.earth/ontology#partOfCompilation> ?Compilation2 . ?Compilation2 <http://linked.earth/ontology#name> ?CompilationName2 . } FILTER (!bound(?CompilationName2) || REGEX(str(?CompilationName2), "Temp12k") || REGEX(str(?CompilationName2), "Pages2kTemperature") || REGEX(str(?CompilationName2), "iso2k")|| REGEX(str(?CompilationName2) , "wNAm"))

?Site a <http://linked.earth/ontology#Location> . OPTIONAL {?Site <http://linked.earth/ontology#name> ?LocationName1 .} BIND(COALESCE(?LocationName1, REPLACE(STR(?Site), "(.*#)|(.Location)", "","i")) as ?LocationName) ?Site <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#lat> ?lat . ?Site <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#long> ?long . BIND(CONCAT(?LocationName, " (", STR(?lat), ", ", STR(?long), ")") AS ?SiteLabel)

?Site2 a <http://linked.earth/ontology#Location> . OPTIONAL {?Site2 <http://linked.earth/ontology#name> ?LocationName2 .} BIND(COALESCE(?LocationName2, REPLACE(STR(?Site2), "(.*#)|(.Location)", "","i")) as ?LocationName0) ?Site2 <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#lat> ?lat2 . ?Site2 <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#long> ?long2 . BIND(CONCAT(?LocationName0, " (", STR(?lat2), ", ", STR(?long2), ")") AS ?Site2Label)

?TimeInterval <http://linked.earth/ontology#hasMinValue> ?e1. ?TimeInterval <http://linked.earth/ontology#hasMaxValue> ?e2. ?TimeInterval <http://linked.earth/ontology#name> ?TimeType FILTER ( !bound(?StartTime) || !bound(?EndTime) || (?e1>=xsd:float(?StartTime) && ?e2<=xsd:float(?EndTime)) || #Overlap entire matching datasets (?e1<xsd:float(?StartTime) && ?e2>xsd:float(?EndTime)) || #Are entirely overlapped by matching datasets ((?e1>=xsd:float(?StartTime) && ?e2<xsd:float(?StartTime)) || (?e2<=xsd:float(?EndTime) && ?e1>xsd:float(?EndTime)) ) #Overlap any portion of matching datasets ).
